name: Quadra-Card Battle
description:
Made for #cardgamejam (jams.gamejolt.com/cardgamejam)

I decided to attempt to create a game based on the Triple Triad game from Final Fantasy VIII.

Click your cards and then click on the board to place your cards. Each card has 4 numbers, 1 on each side. If a player and enemy card are placed next to each other, they compare the numbers touching each other, and the lower number is changed to the colour of the higher numbered card.

Try to defeat the computer! Card values are different every time!
